description: Test your knowledge on ethical principles in ICAIL
generated_text:
"Module 47: Ethics" (53 minutes, Intermediate)
Test your knowledge on ethical principles in ICAIL. Answer 10 multiple-choice questions on topics such as bias, privacy, and transparency. Apply your understanding of ethical considerations in AI development and deployment. Evaluate real-world scenarios and choose the most appropriate course of action. Upon completion, assess your score and review key takeaways to enhance your ethical decision-making skills.
